Agnostic

One stylesheet…all the frameworks.

Get Set Up Now

React, Vue 3, Angular, and Svelte

Web Components, React Native, and more are on the way!

Synchronized Theming

One stylesheet per component propogates to all framework implementations.

Embraces the Platform

Semantic and accessible HTML. Unprocessed CSS. Code towards upcoming standards.

import 'agnostic-react/dist/common.min.css';
import 'agnostic-react/dist/esm/index.css';
import { Button } from 'agnostic-react';
const App = () => (
  <Button mode="primary">Let's go!</Button>
)
ReactDOM.render(
  React.createElement(App, {}, null),
  document.getElementById('root')
);
